name: SkyWars
description:
A first person multiplayer game in which you have to shoot your opponent out of the sky. If you fall out of the map, you lose. Destroy or build on top of the enviorement to survive. 
No Artist were included. Voxel destruction was programmed by ourselfve during the jam without the help of any Voxel Plugin. 

Assets 
Free Keyboard And Controllers Pack | Icons for keyboard and mouse input. | https://opengameart.org/content/free-keyboard-and-controllers-prompts-pack   

Art Assets

Mannequin & Animations |  Character Movement and Gameplay. | https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/animation-starter-pack

Code plugins

Redpoint EOS            | Connecting with Epic Online Service API.          | https://redpointgames.gitlab.io/eos-online-subsystem/docs/      |

| Advanced Sessions      | Additonal session management blueprint functions. | https://github.com/mordentral/AdvancedSessionsPlugin    |

| Runtime Mesh Component | Plugin used for generating a mesh during runtime. | https://github.com/TriAxis-Games/RuntimeMeshComponent    |
